Make the most out of your trip to New York by indulging yourself in an exclusive shopping experience at Henri Bendel. When you book Henri Bendel Experience you receive a $5000 gift card from Henri Bendel along with a personal shopper, and your first night with us is complimentary; In addition, we will waive the Resident Privileges and offer a 2pm checkout.
